links.to_node: stop to help and be late for work
I will be late for my first day of work, potentially upsetting my boss and creating a negative first impression.
The person who crashed may be injured and in need of assistance, which could delay my arrival at work even further.
My decision to stop and help the person in need may demonstrate my compassion and willingness to help others, potentially earning me goodwill from my boss and colleagues.
The delay in my arrival at work may impact the opening and preparation process, potentially causing some initial disorganization at the store.
My act of kindness may lead to a positive interaction with the person I helped, potentially creating a new connection or friendship.
My decision to prioritize helping someone in need over punctuality may reflect positively on my character, demonstrating my values and priorities to my boss and colleagues.
